page.title: 06Leisure/Recreation/Gt.Wald.
page.content: This survey was completed by 50 people,telling us how they like to spend their free-time in Great Waldingfield.A lot of people spend their leisure time watching television. The average amount of time spent watching television was 18 hours,but this isn't including video recorded programmes. Only about 3 hours a week was spent watching video tapes or recorded programmes.Spectating and active sports both received 2-3 hours a week.Keep-Fit and Jogging also received 2 hours a week.Some young people spend some of their free-time at Scouts/Guides/Youth Organisations about 1 hour a week.Other hobbies which people enjoy taking part in are fishing which was very popular, football,drawing,reading and computing.About 4 hours a week were spent in doing these activities.
